name: Gemini Wing
description: Gemini Wing in an arcade game created by Tecmo, released in 1987. A vertically-scrolling shooter, one or two players control a futuristic aircraft travelling over numerous terrains and shooting at enemies of an animalistic or insectoid design. Home conversions were released for the ZX Spectrum, Commodore 64, Amstrad CPC, Amiga, Atari ST, MSX and X68000.
